name: Breaky Wall
description:
Humans are building massive concrete structures around your cybertree. Trapped in concrete prisons it will lose health over time as the sunlight no longer reaches it eventually killing it, failing the game round.

To win each round you must keep your tree photosynthesising at 100% and THEN find the heart gem!

Good luck.

Crayta Link: https://launch.crayta.com/play/4w3sdzye
